name: Diamond P Ranch
reasons: Historic ranch riding through Gallatin National Forest
Wildlife-rich routes with elk, wolves & more
Family-friendly tours at various paces
Option to add a wagon ride or mounted overnight camp
Professional photography package available

name: Parade Rest Guest Ranch
reasons: Montana dude-ranch experience ~10 min from West Yellowstone
Includes comfortable cabin lodging & home-cooked meals
Guided rides surrounded by forest and creek scenery
Offers fly-fishing and hiking alongside the ride
Big enough for families but cozy atmosphere

name: Nine Quarter Circle Ranch
reasons: Breeds and raises its own horses, matched to rider skill
Beginner through advanced trail rides offered
Evening ranch events + horseback games ('gymkhana')
Rich storytelling on history and heritage of the place
Family-friendly, includes kids’ programs

name: Creekside Trail Rides
reasons: Short rides through pine woods, perfect for all ages
Easily combined with evening rodeo tickets
Cheap and cheerful — starts at $60/adult, $65/child
Includes pony rides & wagon rides for young children
Sleek arena lessons also available

name: Yellowstone Horses at Eagle Ridge Ranch
reasons: Generational family-run ranch, ~30 min away
Options: 1–3 hr rides + BBQ cookout, boating & fishing packages
Beginner and first-time riders especially welcome
Small groups with personal guides
Evening cowboy cookout adds fun wrap-up

name: Flying Pig Adventures
reasons: Stunning high-country views over Yellowstone Park
1–2 hr rides, plus cowboy cookout evenings available
Family-friendly (kids 7+) with small groups limited to ~10 riders
Combo “Paddle and Saddle” rafting + riding trips
Includes lunch and snacks on full-day options

name: Roosevelt Corrals (Yellowstone National Park Lodges)
reasons: Rides inside Yellowstone Park, starting at Roosevelt
1-hour & 2-hour rides through sage flats & meadows
Helmets provided; riders 8+ can participate
Scenic routes include Pleasant Valley & Lost Canyon
Option for Old-West cookout packages

name: Wild West Rafting – Horseback Rides
reasons: Recombinant rafting + riding packages near Gardiner & West Yellowstone
Family-friendly combo adventures
Experienced wranglers guide through forested trails
Evening cowboy cookout optional
Full service and safety orientation

name: AllTrips Yellowstone Trail Riding
reasons: Variety of rides: 2 hr, half-day, full-day, overnight packs
Ride into Northwest corner of Yellowstone Park
Includes dinner, overnight camping, and cookout packages
Park permittees — official and well-reviewed
Suitable for riders of all experience levels

name: Destination Yellowstone Horseback Tours
reasons: Offers rides May–October inside/outside park
Supports budget and deluxe options
Winter rides sometimes available in snowcoach season
Family friendly with beginner lessons
Option to add cookouts or overnight pack trips
